data.eml:eml: Gnathia grutterae sp. nov. (Crustacea, Isopoda, Gnathiidae) parasitising representatives of the Balistidae, Labridae and Tetraodontidae from Lizard Island, Great Barrier Reef, Australia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ferreira, Maryke L., Smit, Nico J, Davies, Angela J (2010): Gnathia grutterae sp. nov. (Crustacea, Isopoda, Gnathiidae) parasitising representatives of the Balistidae, Labridae and Tetraodontidae from Lizard Island, Great Barrier Reef, Australia. Zootaxa 2718: 39-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.199792
